title: Question 11
prompt: This party statement mentions that the Green Party is an “international political phenomenon with thousands of officeholders worldwide” and is “145,000-strong in California.” Based on the modern history of political parties in the United States, the author probably uses this wording to convince the reader that the Green Party
description: Click the <u>one best answer</u> to each question.
feedback: Because the United States has been dominated by two major political parties, it has been difficult for other parties to gather supporters. People may feel their votes are lost with a third-party candidate. These statements emphasize the size and strength of the Green Party, and so they are probably included to convince readers that the Green Party is strong enough to compete successfully with the Democratic and Republican parties in elections.
